verses.verse: These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

Ye shall utterly <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H6><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4725>places,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H8033><s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1389>hills,<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7488>green<s%> tree: <S%H6086><s%>

And ye shall <S%H5422>overthrow<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4196>altars,<s%> and <S%H7665>break<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4676>pillars,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H842>groves<s%> with <S%H784>fire;<s%> and ye shall hew <S%H1438>down<s%> the graven <S%H6456>images<s%> of their <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H8034>names<s%> of them out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>
Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> your <S%H7626>tribes<s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> even unto his <S%H7933>habitation<s%> shall ye <S%H1875>seek,<s%> and <S%H8033>thither<s%> thou shalt come: <S%H935><s%>

And <S%H8033>thither<s%> ye shall <S%H935>bring<s%> your burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and your <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> and your <S%H4643>tithes,<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> heave <S%H8641>offerings<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and your <S%H5088>vows,<s%> and your freewill <S%H5071>offerings,<s%> and the <S%H1062>firstlings<s%> of your <S%H1241>herds<s%> and of your flocks: <S%H6629><s%>

And <S%H8033>there<s%> ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and ye shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that ye <S%H4916>put<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> unto, <S%H859>ye<s%> and your <S%H1004>households,<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> thee.

Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> after <S%H3605>all<s%> the things <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H587>we<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> this <S%H3117>day,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> is <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> ye are <S%H3808>not<s%> as <S%H5704>yet<s%> <S%H6258><s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4496>rest<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> you.

But when ye go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> giveth you to <S%H5157>inherit,<s%> <S%H853><s%> and when he giveth you <S%H5117>rest<s%> from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> round <S%H4480>about,<s%> <S%H5439><s%> so that ye <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H983>safety;<s%>

Then there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to cause his <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> shall ye <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> you; your burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and your <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> your <S%H4643>tithes,<s%> and the heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4005>choice<s%> <S%H5088>vows<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye <S%H5087>vow<s%> unto the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And ye shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H859>ye,<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and your <S%H5650>menservants,<s%> and your <S%H519>maidservants,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is within your <S%H8179>gates;<s%> <S%H3588>forasmuch<s%> as he hath <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> nor <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you.
Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to thyself <S%H6435>that<s%> thou <S%H5927>offer<s%> not thy burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou seest: <S%H7200><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of thy <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> thou shalt <S%H5927>offer<s%> thy burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee.

Notwithstanding <S%H7535><s%> thou mayest <S%H2076>kill<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> lusteth <S%H185>after,<s%> according to the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he hath <S%H5414>given<s%> thee: the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof, as of the <S%H6643>roebuck,<s%> and as of the <S%H354>hart.<s%>
Only <S%H7535><s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1818>blood;<s%> ye shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> as <S%H4325>water.<s%>

Thou <S%H3201>mayest<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> within thy <S%H8179>gates<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of thy <S%H1715>corn,<s%> or of thy <S%H8492>wine,<s%> or of thy <S%H3323>oil,<s%> or the <S%H1062>firstlings<s%> of thy <S%H1241>herds<s%> or of thy <S%H6629>flock,<s%> nor <S%H3605>any<s%> of thy <S%H5088>vows<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H5087>vowest,<s%> nor thy freewill <S%H5071>offerings,<s%> or heave <S%H8641>offering<s%> of thine hand: <S%H3027><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> thou must <S%H398>eat<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose,<s%> <S%H859>thou,<s%> and thy <S%H1121>son,<s%> and thy <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and thy <S%H5650>manservant,<s%> and thy <S%H519>maidservant,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is within thy <S%H8179>gates:<s%> and thou shalt <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that thou <S%H4916>puttest<s%> thine <S%H3027>hands<s%> unto.

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to thyself that thou forsake <S%H6435>not<s%> <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> as long as thou <S%H3605>livest<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H127>earth.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1366>border,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H1696>promised<s%> thee, and thou shalt <S%H559>say,<s%> I will <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>longeth<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> thou mayest <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> lusteth <S%H185>after.<s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> be too <S%H7368>far<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee, then thou shalt <S%H2076>kill<s%> of thy <S%H4480>herd<s%> <S%H1241><s%> and of thy <S%H4480>flock,<s%> <S%H6629><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> thee <S%H834>as<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee, and thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> in thy <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> thy <S%H5315>soul<s%> lusteth <S%H185>after.<s%>

Even <S%H389><s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6643>roebuck<s%> and the <S%H354>hart<s%> is <S%H398>eaten,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> them: the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> of them <S%H3162>alike.<s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> be <S%H2388>sure<s%> that thou <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1115>not<s%> the <S%H1818>blood:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> is the <S%H5315>life;<s%> and thou mayest <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> it; thou shalt <S%H8210>pour<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> as <S%H4325>water.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> it; <S%H4616>that<s%> it may go <S%H3190>well<s%> with thee, and with thy <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee, <S%H3588>when<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> thy holy <S%H6944>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H1961>hast,<s%> and thy <S%H5088>vows,<s%> thou shalt <S%H5375>take,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall choose: <S%H977><s%>

And thou shalt <S%H6213>offer<s%> thy burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God:<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of thy <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> shall be poured <S%H8210>out<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

Observe <S%H8104><s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee, <S%H4616>that<s%> it may go <S%H3190>well<s%> with thee, and with thy <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> thee <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> thou <S%H6213>doest<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God.<s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> shall cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H935>goest<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> them, and thou <S%H3423>succeedest<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwellest<s%> in their <S%H776>land;<s%>

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to thyself <S%H6435>that<s%> thou be not <S%H5367>snared<s%> by <S%H310>following<s%> them, after <S%H310>that<s%> they be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee; and <S%H6435>that<s%> thou <S%H1875>inquire<s%> not after their <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> did <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H430>gods?<s%> even <S%H3651>so<s%> will <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H1571>likewise.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H8130>hateth,<s%> have they <S%H6213>done<s%> unto their <S%H430>gods;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> they have <S%H8313>burnt<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%> to their <S%H430>gods.<s%>

<S%H853><s%> What thing <S%H3605>soever<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> you, <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> it: thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3254>add<s%> <S%H5921>thereto,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1639>diminish<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> it.
